DOC.brief_summary: The focus pilot study determine woman experience pain sexual intercourse high risk complication labor delivery secondary pelvic floor dysfunction , anxiety intolerance towards pelvic examination . Furthermore , unclear whether woman prepartum dyspareunia experience improvement follow vaginal delivery . While physician may expect vaginal birth improve dyspareunia due stretch effect pelvic floor , date , insufficient evidence support claim . The Investigators plan prospectively study 200 patient Institution , collect information regard birth follow , via questionnaire , regard dyspareunia postpartum .
DOC.criteria: 1 . 200 nulliparous woman admit Labor Delivery Department Hadassah Medical Center , age 18 . 2 . Able willing read , understand , sign Informed Consent Form questionnaire . 3 . Agree contact future complete telephone questionnaire . 1 . Induction labor 2 . Placental abruption , placenta previa 3 . Malpresentation 4 . Non reassure fetal heart rate upon admission 5 . Any contraindication vaginal delivery 6 . Multifetal pregnancy
